body: @Zero Tsu Lmao. Do you people really think that people like ugly bastard tags because they want to self-insert? That's hilarious. Maybe you think people who like bestiality are furries too?

Nah for me, that ugly bastard make it even better, if it just casual man it so boring AF.. 
you guys can't understand why? here let me give you little explanation.
you can tell how slut/bitch she is (in the story), it doesn't matter how ugly the man is, if it make her cum, she will enjoy fucking with that man. 
Understood??
Would have been better with an average looking dude.dunno why ugly looking and good looking moffos ruin it for me

@Typical japanese MainCharacter
Stop acting like someone looking at it objectively. "dark and real side" my ass, just because people like you probably identify themselves with the "ugly bastard" thing? I've been watching and reading hentai for over a decade now and it still pisses me off. This shitty genre became a thing so low-lifes who actually just look like that don't feel left out in this world so they cling to this hope they have a chance in this world with a physical look like that. People who really enjoy to see an ugly fat guy fucking around with a good looking girl, especially if the guy shows a bland personality or even is an asshole, I just never will understand shit like that. I mean I gotta accept it but stop trying to justify this bullshit here like it is common sense or something.

As always, the art of chin sensei is from another world, i've nothing to say about that ugly (kinda literally) motherfucker, some of those who have that fetish will really see the point of this tag/genre, but I've to say that it is really good drawn and complemets a little bit the thicc of Yukari
NGL in the first pages I've a good kek of yukari's reaction.

I too used to hate "ugly bastard" and "NTR". That was until I noticed I was paying too much attention to the male character and not the woman. Now? I just see hot chicks getting their bodies played with like toys and cumming in ways they never thought possible. That's the focal point. When you realize that appeal, it won't matter if it's a ugly old bastard or a cool manly chad. You're going to nut to that hot waifu loosing her mind as she cums.
womb is reacting to compatible penis is new hot thing i never expected

You fucking casuals have no idea, there is a reason why the fat ugly archetype is used so often, the problem with you casual millennials is that you're new to the japanese hentai industry, much like the typical japanese idealized self-insert that you see in nearly every other vanilla crap stuff or in anime/manga/game romcom harem where they represent the wishful "light"side of fantasy, this right here represents the dark & real side of the target demographic, good looking people don't waste their time with these, they go out and get bitches, ever seen a "idol fan meeting"? Or perhaps an "otaku convention"? Look at those people, look at the authors of these works, then maybe, you'll understand why the fat ugly archetype has been a thing before you zoomers where concieved. This has been a niche industry, and you "fresh" new clowns who have just now hopped on and found out about this are always making demands. Go for that boring vanilla dung then, with the typical overused mc.
Ugly aside, good fap material and art is 10/10.
Who the fuck is ugly bastard for? Like, no one is THAT ugly to need this sort of representation
